title: Bikes Or Death Interviews Ally Johnson, Bikepacking Roots’ New Executive Director
content:
Earlier this year, Ally Johnson was announced as Bikepacking Roots‘ new Executive Director and in the latest episode of Bikes or Death, Patrick sits down with Ally to get to know her a bit better and to go over her plans with BPR.

The post Bikes Or Death Interviews Ally Johnson, Bikepacking Roots’ New Executive Director appeared first on The Radavist.
author: prolly
